tachyon.client

Class TachyonFS

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.client.TachyonFS
  • Deprecated.

    @PublicApi
@Deprecated
public class TachyonFS
extends Object
    Client API to use Tachyon as a file system. This API is not compatible with HDFS file system API; while tachyon.hadoop.AbstractTFS provides another API that exposes Tachyon as HDFS file system. Under the hood, this class maintains a MasterClientBase to talk to the master server and WorkerClients to interact with different Tachyon workers. As of 0.8, replaced by TachyonFileSystem

public int createDependency(List<String> parents,

                              String comment,
                              String framework,
                              String frameworkVersion,
                              int dependencyType,
                              long childrenBlockSizeByte)
                     throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a dependency.
        Parameters:
        parents - the dependency's input files
        children - the dependency's output files
        commandPrefix - identifies a command prefix
        data - stores dependency data
        comment - records a dependency comment
        framework - identifies the framework
        frameworkVersion - identifies the framework version
        dependencyType - the dependency's type, Wide or Narrow
        childrenBlockSizeByte - the block size of the dependency's output files
        Returns:
        the dependency's id
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying master RPC fails

      • createFile

        public long createFile(TachyonURI path,
              TachyonURI ufsPath,
              long blockSizeBytes,
              boolean recursive)
                throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new file in the file system.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the file
        ufsPath - The path of the file in the under file system. If this is empty, the file does not exist in the under file system yet.
        blockSizeBytes - The size of the block in bytes. It is -1 iff ufsPath is non-empty.
        recursive - Creates necessary parent folders if true, not otherwise.
        Returns:
        The file id, which is globally unique
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying master RPC fails

      • delete

        public boolean delete(long fileId,
             TachyonURI path,
             boolean recursive)
               throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Deletes a file or folder.
        Parameters:
        fileId - The id of the file / folder. If it is not INVALID_FILE_ID, path parameter is ignored. Otherwise, the method uses the path parameter.
        path - The path of the file / folder. It could be empty iff id is not INVALID_FILE_ID.
        recursive - If fileId or path represents a non-empty folder, delete the folder recursively or not.
        Returns:
        true if deletes successfully, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying master RPC fails

      • getFile

        public TachyonFile getFile(long fid)
                    throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Gets TachyonFile based on the file id. NOTE: This *will* use cached file metadata, and so will not see changes to dynamic properties, such as the pinned flag. This is also different from the behavior of getFile(path), which by default will not use cached metadata.
        Parameters:
        fid - file id.
        Returns:
        TachyonFile of the file id, or null if the file does not exist
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying master RPC fails

      • getFile

        public TachyonFile getFile(long fid,
                  boolean useCachedMetadata)
                    throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Gets TachyonFile based on the file id. If useCachedMetadata, this will not see changes to the file's pin setting, or other dynamic properties.
        Parameters:
        fid - the file id
        useCachedMetadata - whether to use cached metadata
        Returns:
        TachyonFile of the file id, or null if the file does not exist
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying master RPC fails

      • getFile

        public TachyonFile getFile(TachyonURI path)
                    throws IOException
        Deprecated.

        Returns:

        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying master RPC fails

      • getFile

        public TachyonFile getFile(TachyonURI path,
                  boolean useCachedMetadata)
                    throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Gets TachyonFile based on the path. If useCachedMetadata is true, this will not see changes to the file's pin setting, or other dynamic properties.

        path - file path.
        useCachedMetadata - whether to use the file metadata cache
        Returns:
        TachyonFile of the path, or null if the file does not exist

        IOException - if the underlying master RPC fails

      • freepath

        public boolean freepath(long fileId,
               TachyonURI path,
               boolean recursive)
                 throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Frees an in-memory file or folder.
        Parameters:
        fileId - The id of the file / folder. If it is not INVALID_FILE_ID, path parameter is ignored. Otherwise, the method uses the path parameter.
        path - The path of the file / folder. It could be empty iff id is not INVALID_FILE_ID.
        recursive - If fileId or path represents a non-empty folder, free the folder recursively or not
        Returns:
        true if in-memory free successfully, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying master RPC fails

        Returns:

      • rename

        public boolean rename(long fileId,
             TachyonURI srcPath,
             TachyonURI dstPath)
               throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Renames a file or folder to the indicated new path.
        Parameters:
        fileId - The id of the source file / folder. If it is not INVALID_FILE_ID, path parameter is ignored. Otherwise, the method uses the srcPath parameter.
        srcPath - The path of the source file / folder. It could be empty iff id is not INVALID_FILE_ID.
        dstPath - The path of the destination file / folder. It could be empty iff id is not INVALID_FILE_ID.
        Returns:
        true if renames successfully, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying master RPC fails

      • requestSpace

        public long requestSpace(long blockId,
                long requestSpaceBytes)
                  throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Tries to request space for certain block. Only works when a local worker exists.
        Parameters:
        blockId - the id of the block that space will be allocated for
        requestSpaceBytes - size to request in bytes
        Returns:
        the size bytes that allocated to the block, -1 if no local worker exists
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying file does not exist

      • setPinned

        public void setPinned(long fid,
             boolean pinned)
               throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the "pinned" flag for the given file. Pinned files are never evicted by Tachyon until they are unpinned. Calling setPinned() on a folder will recursively set the "pinned" flag on all of that folder's children. This may be an expensive operation for folders with many files/subfolders.
        Parameters:
        fid - the file id
        pinned - the target "pinned" flag value
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying master RPC fails

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Deprecated. 
        Prints out the string representation of this Tachyon server address.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        the string representation like tachyon://host:port or tachyon-ft://host:port

        public void unpinFile(long fid)
               throws IOException

        Throws:
        IOException - when the underlying worker RPC fails
        See Also:
        setPinned(long, boolean)

      • createFile

        public long createFile(TachyonURI path)
                throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a file with the default block size (1GB) in the system. It also creates necessary folders along the path. TODO(hy): It should not create necessary path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file
        Returns:
        The unique file id. It returns -1 if the creation failed
        Throws:
        IOException - if the operation fails

      • createFile

        public long createFile(TachyonURI path,
              long blockSizeByte)
                throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a file in the system. It also creates necessary folders along the path. TODO(hy): It should not create necessary path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file
        blockSizeByte - the block size of the file
        Returns:
        The unique file id. It returns -1 if the creation failed
        Throws:
        IOException - if the operation fails

      • createFile

        public long createFile(TachyonURI path,
              TachyonURI ufsPath)
                throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a file in the system with a pre-defined underfsPath. It also creates necessary folders along the path. TODO(hy): It should not create necessary path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file in Tachyon
        ufsPath - the path of the file in the underfs
        Returns:
        The unique file id. It returns -1 if the creation failed
        Throws:
        IOException - if the operation fails

      • delete

        public boolean delete(long fid,
             boolean recursive)
               throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Deletes the file denoted by the file id.
        Parameters:
        fid - file id
        recursive - if delete the path recursively.
        Returns:
        true if deletion succeed (including the case the file does not exist in the first place), false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if the operation fails

      • mkdir

        public boolean mkdir(TachyonURI path)
              throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Create a directory if it does not exist. The method also creates necessary non-existing parent folders.
        Parameters:
        path - Directory path.
        Returns:
        true if the folder is created successfully or already existing. false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if the operation fails

               throws IOException

        dstPath - the new path of the file in the file system.
        Returns:
        true if succeed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if the operation fails

      • rename

        public boolean rename(TachyonURI srcPath,
             TachyonURI dstPath)
               throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Renames the srcPath to the dstPath.
        Parameters:

        dstPath - The path of the destination file / folder.
        Returns:
        true if succeed, false otherwise
        Throws:

      • freepath

        public boolean freepath(TachyonURI path,
               boolean recursive)
                 throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Frees the in-memory blocks of file/folder denoted by the path.
        Parameters:
        path - the file/folder path
        recursive - if free the path recursively
        Returns:
        true if the memory free succeed (including the case that the path does not exist in the first place), false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if the operation fails
